name: Density Experiment
description:
|| 1.1 Bug Fixes:

No longer needs to be run in admin mode, & save files work as intended!

Physics sometimes decided not to initialise, should now work almost all the time, probably. ||

Density Experiment is a student project by Tim Drew (Red Squirrel Games) & Cameron Callaghan.

In Density Experiment you are stuck in a maze full of traps, & you must collect 3 treasures in order to escape.

Make your way through the maze & avoid the many hazards by rotating the world around you - you are unable to jump, so use the changing gravity to your advantage. Fly through levels without touching the ground or take a more cautious approach & size up the challenge ahead - the choice is yours!

Features 50+ levels of a looping maze you can easily get lost in, original music to keep you company as you die many times & a unique rotation mechanic which provides a fun & interesting way to move around.
